participant_1.name: Marcus
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back with a strong sense of community.
participant_1.background: I'm a big guy with a big heart, and I love my family and my culture. I love to cut down trees. I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store. I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors. I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and expressive, always eager to share her passions with others.
participant_2.background: My clothes make me feel like a young woman, even though I am in my forties. I hate skiing. I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands. I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders. I am vegan.

content.text: It is going great! I am so excited for the concert I am going to this weekend!
Oh, I love them! I listen to them when I work at my candy store.
That's awesome! What kind of candy do you sell?
Mostly chocolate, but we also have some other types.
I love chocolate! Do you have any vegan chocolate?
Yes, we actually have a whole section of vegan chocolate.
That's awesome! I love meeting other vegans.
Me too! It's nice to know that there are other people out there who are passionate about the same things I am.
Totally! I'm glad I met you!
